Comment: A clear bearish Break of Structure occurs at 2025-10-17 22:00:00 when price closes below the recent swing low around 4377.91 (2025-10-17 21:00:00). The neckline candle causing this break is the bearish candle at 2025-10-17 22:00:00. The highest bearish candle to the right of neckline is at 2025-10-17 15:00:00 (open 4401.27, high 4432.13), and to the left of this bearish candle, the first bullish candle is at 2025-10-17 14:00:00. Thus, the POI candle is the bearish candle at 2025-10-17 15:00:00, making the POI zone from its open to wick high (4401.27 to 4432.13). This zone represents the last opposing bearish candle before the strong downward move, indicating institutional interest.
